Build-Depends: cmake (>= 3.0), debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-exec, extra-cmake-modules (>= 1.6) [linux-any], libegl1-mesa-dev [linux-any], libgl1-mesa-dev | libgl-dev, libwayland-dev [linux-any], libx11-dev, libxcursor-dev, libxi-dev, libxinerama-dev, libxkbcommon-dev, libxrandr-dev, pkg-config [linux-any], wayland-protocols (>= 1.15) [linux-any]
